subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage limits on GPT-4o apply, such as up to 80 messages every 3 hours.
5x the usage of the free tier, with higher limits before rate limiting kicks in.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: Exact adoption rates are proprietary. However, the integration of premier models into $20/month subscriptions (ChatGPT Plus, Claude Pro) represents a major consumer pricing strategy with high growth, driven by the value of flagship models like GPT-4o and Claude 3.5 Sonnet.
pricing_analysis.trend: The primary trend for 2024-2025 is a dramatic decrease in the cost of high-intelligence models, making state-of-the-art performance accessible at a fraction of previous prices. This is driven by intense competition and architectural improvements. Concurrently, a tiered pricing structure has solidified: highly efficient, smaller models (like Haiku, Gemini 1.5 Flash) are priced near-zero for high-volume tasks, while flagship models (GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet) are offered at aggressive per-token prices and bundled into consumer subscriptions to drive mass adoption.
